summary: Living in Almaty, Kazakhstan, a young man is preparing to become a bus conductor. One day, in between wandering the city streets, and going to the movies, he makes the acquaintance of a female student.
cast: Talgat Assetov|Samat Beysenbin|Baljan Bisembekova|Indira Jeksembaeva|Kairat Mahmetov
title: Kairat
